channel.title: How can I make players can train attack till 110 for example?
channel.description: How can I make players can train attack till 110 for example?

item.title: How can I make players can train attack till 110 for example?
item.dc:creator: @kilop kilop
item.description:
@kilop wrote:

Search for “return 99;” there should be something that looks like this public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > 13034430) return 99; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; }

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; if (exp > however much exp you want until they reach level 110) return 110; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 110; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0)); output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; }

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make players can train attack till 110 for example?
